summary: The Refinancing Relief for Veterans Act (H.R. 3384) proposes to amend Title 38 of the United States Code to adjust fees associated with interest rate reduction refinancing housing loans guaranteed, insured, or made by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs. It modifies the loan fee table to specify different fee percentages based on the loan's closing date, ranging from August 1, 2025, to after December 31, 2035.
